title: 104_hr502
content: Social Security Account Number Anti-Fraud Act - Amends title II (OASDI) of the Social Security Act to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to: (1) establish, according to prescribed guidelines, an electronic program for American employers to verify the social security number and other relevant employment information to reduce the use of fraudulent social security documents for employment purposes. (2) implement such program according to a prescribed schedule, making it available to all employers in the States of California, Florida, Illinois, New Jersey, New York, and Texas. And (3) report to the Congress on the Program's initial implementation.
